verses.verse: Of David. Bless Jehovah, O my soul, and all within me, bless His holy name.
Bless Jehovah, O my soul, and forget not all His benefits;
He who forgives all your iniquities; who heals all your diseases;
who redeems your life from destruction; who crowns you with kindness and tender mercies;
who satisfies your desire with good; your youth is renewed like an eagle.
Jehovah works righteousness and judgments for all the ones being oppressed.
He made known His ways to Moses, His acts to the sons of Israel.
Jehovah is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, and abundant in mercy.
He will not always strive, and not will He keep His anger forever.
He has not done to us according to our sins, and has not rewarded us according to our iniquities.
For as the heavens are above the earth, so is His mercy mighty over those fearing Him.
As far as the east is from the west, so far has He put our transgressions from us.
As the pity of a father over his sons, so Jehovah pities those who fear Him.
For He knows our form, remembering that we are dust.
As for man, his days are as grass; as the flower of the field, so he flourishes.
For the wind passes over it, and it is not; and its place never recognizes it again.
But the mercy of Jehovah is from everlasting, even to everlasting, on those who fear Him; yea, His righteousness is to the sons of sons;
to those who keep His covenant, and to those who remember His precepts, to do them.
Jehovah has prepared His throne in Heaven, and His kingdom rules over all.
Bless Jehovah, O angels of His; mighty in strength; doing His Word; listening to the voice of His Word.
Bless Jehovah, all His hosts, ministers of His, doing His will.
Bless Jehovah, all His works in all the places of His dominion; bless Jehovah, O my soul.
